trans-unit.source: Enables the user to navigate Web pages inside your form.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control lets you host Web pages and other browser-enabled documents in your Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項可讓您主機的網頁和 Windows Forms 應用程式中的其他瀏覽器啟用文件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, for example, to provide integrated HTML-based user assistance or Web browsing capabilities in your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制，例如，提供整合式的 HTML 為基礎的使用者協助或 Web 應用程式中的瀏覽功能。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to add your existing Web-based controls to your Windows Forms client applications.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>將現有的 Web 型控制項新增至用戶端應用程式 Windows Form 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control is resource-intensive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項是需要大量資源。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose> method when you are finished using the control to ensure that all resources are released in a timely fashion.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose>方法，當您完成使用控制項，以確保能夠及時並釋出所有資源。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose> method on the same thread that attached the events, which should always be the message or user-interface (UI) thread.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose>附加的事件，應該一律是訊息的同一個執行緒或使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has several properties, methods, and events related to navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項有數個屬性、 方法和瀏覽與相關的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following members let you navigate the control to a specific URL, move backward and forward through the navigation history list, and load the home page and search page of the current user:
trans-unit.target: 下列成員，可讓您將控制項巡覽至特定 URL、 向後移動向前巡覽記錄的清單，以及載入首頁和搜尋目前使用者 頁面：

trans-unit.source: If the navigation is unsuccessful, a page indicating the problem is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果巡覽失敗時，會顯示頁面，指出發生問題。

trans-unit.source: Navigation with any of these members causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> events to occur at different stages of navigation.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽與任何這些成員原因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件發生的不同階段瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: These and other members, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> methods, let you implement user interface controls in your application similar to those in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 這些和其他成員，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，可讓您在 Internet Explorer 中類似的應用程式中實作使用者介面控制項。

trans-unit.source: Some members are useful even when you do not want to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control on your form.
trans-unit.target: 即使您不想要顯示某些成員時才有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項在表單上的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Print%2A> method to print the latest version of a Web page without displaying the page to the user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Print%2A>列印網頁的最新版本，而不會向使用者顯示頁面的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control also lets you display content that you create in your application or you retrieve from a database or resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項也可讓您顯示您建立應用程式中，或您從資料庫或資源檔擷取的內容。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A> property to get or set the contents of the current document as a string or data stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A>屬性來取得或設定目前文件的內容當做字串或資料流。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the contents of a Web page through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property, which contains an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> object that provides managed access to the HTML document object model (DOM) for the current page.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以管理的網頁內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>存取 managed HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 目前頁面的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful, when used in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A> property, to implement two-way communication between your application code and dynamic HTML (DHTML) code in a Web page, letting you combine Web-based controls and Windows Forms controls in a single user interface.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用時，此屬性相當實用，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>屬性，在網頁上，讓您結合網頁控制項和 Windows Form 控制項中實作您的應用程式程式碼和動態 HTML (DHTML) 程式碼之間的雙向通訊單一使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property to call scripting code methods from your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>從您的應用程式呼叫指令碼的程式碼方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to the object that you specify for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼程式碼可以存取您的應用程式，透過`window.external`物件，它是供主機存取的內建 DOM 物件和其對應至您指定的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX [WebBrowser control](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812), and uses whichever version of the control is installed on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項是 ActiveX 的 managed 包裝函式[WebBrowser 控制項](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812)，並使用使用者的電腦上安裝任何版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class makes security demands at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 此類別可讓類別層級的安全性要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when a derived class or any caller in the call stack does not have full trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>衍生的類別或呼叫堆疊中的任何呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement an address bar for use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作與使用 [網址] 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonGo`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。

trans-unit.source: When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to the URL specified.
trans-unit.target: 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: for derived classes to inherit this control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類別得以繼承此控制項。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> class.
By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control is empty.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項為空白。

trans-unit.source: To navigate it to an initial document, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽它的初始文件，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control is hosted inside Internet Explorer.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can navigate to another page after its initial page has been loaded.
<see langword="true" /> if the control can navigate to another page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可巡覽至其他網頁，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not prevent you from loading an initial page by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A> property, but will prevent all subsequent navigation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會阻止您藉由設定載入其初始網頁<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A>屬性，但是會讓所有後續的瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control navigates to documents that are dropped onto it.
<see langword="true" /> if the control accepts documents that are dropped onto it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項接受已拖曳至其本身的文件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control automatically navigates to documents that are dropped onto it.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項自動巡覽至已拖曳至其本身的文件。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用控制項做為一般的瀏覽器時，此行為是很有用。

trans-unit.source: If you use the control to display content designed specifically for your application, such as HTML-based user assistance, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A> property to `false` to prevent the display of other content.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用控制項來顯示特別針對您的應用程式而設計的內容，例如 HTML 為基礎的使用者需協助，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A>屬性`false`以防止其他內容的顯示。

trans-unit.source: This is particularly useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要隱藏您使用的事實，這是特別有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項，例如若要建立緊密結合了網頁型的控制項，與 Windows Form 控制項的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: You can disable other standard browser features by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定停用其他標準瀏覽器功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is not related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AllowDrop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and does not cause drag-and-drop events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to occur for the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與不相關<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AllowDrop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性並不會造成拖放事件這類<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項中發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the underlying ActiveX control.
Called by the control when the underlying ActiveX control is created.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this method to cast the underlying ActiveX object to an appropriate interface and cache it in a member variable.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以將基礎 ActiveX 物件轉換成適當的介面，並快取在成員變數中。

trans-unit.source: This value must then be released in an override of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserBase.DetachInterfaces" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 此值必須再發行中的覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserBase.DetachInterfaces" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a previous page in navigation history is available, which allows the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack" /> method to succeed.
<see langword="true" /> if the control can navigate backward; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可向後巡覽，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method navigates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to the previous page in this history, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>方法巡覽<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項加入此歷程記錄中的上一頁，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性來判斷是否可瀏覽歷程記錄，同時包含前一頁。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method will succeed.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>方法將會成功。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur.
trans-unit.target: 否則，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>方法會傳回值為`false`，會發生任何的導覽。

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged> event to receive a notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**回**按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property to implement a **Back** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性來實作**回**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似的控制項**回**Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `backButton`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`backButton`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack" /> property value changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method navigates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to the previous page in this history, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>方法巡覽<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項加入此歷程記錄中的上一頁，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property indicates whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性會指出是否可瀏覽歷程記錄，同時包含前一頁。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged> event to receive a notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**回**按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的開頭。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged> event to implement a **Back** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged>事件以實作**回**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似的控制項**回**網際網路中的按鈕[總管]。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `backButton`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`backButton`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a subsequent page in navigation history is available, which allows the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward" /> method to succeed.
<see langword="true" /> if the control can navigate forward; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可向前巡覽，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method navigates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to the next page in this history, if one is available as a result of a previous backward navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>方法巡覽<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項加入這項記錄，到下一個頁面，如果有的話，因為先前的向後巡覽。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method will succeed.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>方法將會成功。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur.
trans-unit.target: 否則，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>方法會傳回值為`false`，會發生任何的導覽。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A> property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one, allowing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>屬性來判斷是否巡覽記錄中有，並包含在目前頁面允許<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>方法順利完成。

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForwardChanged> event to receive a notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForwardChanged>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**向前**按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A> event to implement a **Forward** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control that is similar to the **Forward** button in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>事件以實作**向前**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似的控制項**向前**按鈕Internet Explorer。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonForward`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonForward`。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.

trans-unit.source: Associates the underlying ActiveX control with a client that can handle control events.

This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會很有用，如果您很熟悉使用未受管理的 OLE 開發`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項，而且您想要擴充功能的 Windows Form<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項，這是 ActiveX 控制項的 managed 包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this extensibility to implement events from the ActiveX control that are not provided by the wrapper control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此擴充來實作所未提供的包裝函式控制項的事件從 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> that supplements the normal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> events with the `NavigateError` event from the OLE `DWebBrowserEvents2` interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何從衍生類別中的此方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>，補充標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>事件`NavigateError`來自 OLE 事件`DWebBrowserEvents2`介面。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the unmanaged <see langword="WebBrowser" /> ActiveX control site, which you can extend to customize the managed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite" /> that represents the <see langword="WebBrowser" /> ActiveX control site.

This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會很有用，如果您很熟悉使用未受管理的 OLE 開發`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項，而且您想要擴充功能的 Windows Form<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項，這是 ActiveX 控制項的 managed 包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this extensibility, for example, to customize the browser shortcut menu and shortcut keys or to provide a custom security configuration for hosted documents.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此擴充性，例如，來自訂瀏覽器快顯功能表和快速鍵，或提供裝載的文件的自訂安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: To use this feature, implement classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite> classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這項功能，實作繼承自類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite>類別。

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control uses the protected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateWebBrowserSiteBase%2A> method to retrieve extensibility interfaces implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite> class.
trans-unit.target: 未受`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項會使用受保護<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateWebBrowserSiteBase%2A>方法來擷取所實作的擴充性介面<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite>類別。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateWebBrowserSiteBase%2A> method to return an instance of your own class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateWebBrowserSiteBase%2A>方法以傳回自己的類別繼承自執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite> class provides default implementations of the OLE `IDocHostUIHandler` interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserSite>類別會提供預設實作的 OLE`IDocHostUIHandler`介面。

trans-unit.source: You can provide your own implementation of this interface or implement any other `WebBrowser` ActiveX control interface in order to customize the behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供您自己的實作這個介面，或實作任何其他`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項介面，以自訂控制項的行為。

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own implementation for any `IDocHostUIHandler` members, you must implement all the members of that interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供您自己的實作任何`IDocHostUIHandler`成員，您必須實作該介面的所有成員。

trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫此方法以釋放的參考中的覆寫快取的基礎 ActiveX 物件<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserBase.AttachInterfaces(System.Object)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Releases the event-handling client attached in the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateSink" /> method from the underlying ActiveX control.

This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會很有用，如果您很熟悉使用未受管理的 OLE 開發`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項，而且您想要擴充功能的 Windows Form<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項，這是 ActiveX 控制項的 managed 包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this extensibility to implement events from the ActiveX control that are not provided by the wrapper control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此擴充來實作所未提供的包裝函式控制項的事件從 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> that supplements the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> events with the `NavigateError` event from the OLE `DWebBrowserEvents2` interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何從衍生類別中的此方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>，補充標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>事件`NavigateError`來自 OLE 事件`DWebBrowserEvents2`介面。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateSink%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CreateSink%2A>。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" /> representing the Web page currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" /> representing the current page, or <see langword="null" /> if no page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" />，代表目前的網頁；如果未載入任何網頁，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when you want to access the contents of a Web page displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control through the HTML document object model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，當您想要存取中顯示的網頁內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>透過 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to use Web-based controls in your Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您想要在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用 Web 型控制項，這十分有用。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A> property, to implement two-way communication between a Web page displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control and your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，結合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>屬性，來實作中顯示的網頁之間的雙向通訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項和應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.InvokeScript%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to call script methods implemented in a Web page from your client application code.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.InvokeScript%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來呼叫在網頁從用戶端應用程式程式碼中實作之指令碼方法。

trans-unit.source: Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to an object that you specify for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼程式碼可以存取您的應用程式，透過`window.external`物件，它是供主機存取的內建 DOM 物件和其對應至您指定的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的字串形式的網頁內容，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access the contents of a Web page as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的網頁內容<xref:System.IO.Stream>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating> event to determine whether a Web page form has been filled in.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性中的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>事件，以判斷是否已滿網頁表單。

trans-unit.source: If the input field does not contain a value, the navigation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的欄位不會包含值，則會取消巡覽。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control finishes loading a document.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至新的文件已設定其中一個的下列屬性或方法呼叫時：

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event to receive notification when the new document finishes loading.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>新文件載入完畢時收到通知的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event occurs, the new document is fully loaded, which means you can access its contents through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件發生時，完全載入新文件，這表示您可以存取透過其內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification before navigation begins, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽開始之前，收到通知，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>事件。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件可讓您取消巡覽，如果特定條件未符合，比方說，當使用者已無法完整填寫表單。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated> event to receive notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>完成瀏覽控制項，且已開始載入新的位置處的文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this event to print a document after it has fully loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件，它完全載入後，列印文件。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a stream containing the contents of the Web page displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the contents of the current Web page, or <see langword="null" /> if no page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，包含目前網頁的內容；如果未載入任何網頁，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to load a Web page into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來載入到網頁<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項從<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to load Web pages from a database or resource file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從資料庫或資源檔載入網頁，例如，使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定此屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項自動巡覽至相關： 空白 URL，然後再載入指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> events occur when you set this property, and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A> property is no longer meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件發生，當您設定這個屬性，以及值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>屬性不再有意義。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the contents of the current document, even if another document has been requested.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含目前的文件的內容，即使已要求另一個文件。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has not had time to load the new content.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定這個屬性的值，然後立即擷取一次擷取的值可能會與設定如果的值不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制何時未在時間來載入新的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the new value in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取中的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的字串形式的網頁內容，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過存取使用 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的頁面內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTML contents of the page displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
The HTML text of the displayed page, or the empty string ("") if no document is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示之網頁的 HTML 文字；如果未載入任何文件，則為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when you want to manipulate the contents of an HTML page displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control using string processing tools.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，當您想要管理的 HTML 網頁中顯示內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制使用字串處理工具。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to load pages from a database or to analyze pages using regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，例如，從資料庫載入頁面，或分析使用規則運算式的網頁。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定此屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項自動巡覽至相關： 空白 URL，然後再載入指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> events occur when you set this property, and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A> property is no longer meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件發生，當您設定這個屬性，以及值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>屬性不再有意義。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the text of the current document, even if another document has been requested.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含目前的文件的文字，即使已要求另一個文件。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has not had time to load the new content.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定這個屬性的值，然後立即擷取一次擷取的值可能會與設定如果的值不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制何時未在時間來載入新的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the new value in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取中的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can block the thread until the document is loaded by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a loop until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A> property returns the value that you originally set it to.
trans-unit.target: 或者，封鎖執行緒，直到呼叫載入文件<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法中的迴圈，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>屬性會傳回原先要設定的值。

trans-unit.source: To access the contents of a Web page as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的網頁內容<xref:System.IO.Stream>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過存取使用 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的頁面內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A> property to programmatically display document content of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>以程式設計方式顯示您所選擇的文件內容的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title of the document currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
The title of the current document, or the empty string ("") if no document is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 目前文件的標題；如果未載入任何文件，則為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful, for example, when you want to display the document title in the title bar of the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是很有用，例如，當您想要在應用程式的標題列中顯示文件標題。

trans-unit.source: If no title has been defined for the current document, this property is set to the document location and file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果已針對目前的文件定義沒有標題，此屬性設定為文件的位置和檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitleChanged> event to update the title in the title bar when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to a new document.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitleChanged>事件，以更新標題中的標題列時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至新的文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitle%2A> property to update the form title bar with the title of the current document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitle%2A>目前文件的標題以更新表單標題列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitle" /> property value changes.
You can handle this event to update the title bar of your application with the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件的目前值與更新您的應用程式的標題列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitleChanged> event to update the form title bar with the title of the current document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentTitleChanged>目前文件的標題以更新表單標題列的事件。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。

trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

The type of the current document.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property corresponds to the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the document.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值對應至文件的多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 類型。

A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the encryption method used by the document currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevelChanged> event to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevelChanged>事件以實作類似 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示應用程式的使用者介面中的指標。

trans-unit.source: When the current document is not encrypted, the value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel.Insecure?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的文件未加密時，這個屬性的值會是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel.Insecure?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control displays a Web page containing multiple frames with content of different encryption levels, the value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel.Mixed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項會顯示包含多個具有不同的加密層級的內容框架的網頁，這個屬性的值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel.Mixed?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When the encryption level is unknown, the value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 未知的加密層級時，這個屬性的值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserEncryptionLevel.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Other values indicate the type of encryption present.
trans-unit.target: 其他值則表示現有的加密類型。

trans-unit.source: To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, display the encryption type in a ToolTip that appears when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator.
trans-unit.target: 若要模擬行為的 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示，顯示的加密類型滑鼠指標停留在指標時，會出現在工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control navigates to or away from a Web site that uses encryption.

You can use this event with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevel%2A> property to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevel%2A>屬性來實作類似 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示應用程式的使用者介面中的指標。

trans-unit.source: In a handler for this event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevel%2A> property to determine whether you should hide or display the indicator.
trans-unit.target: 在此事件處理常式中檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevel%2A>屬性來判斷是否應該隱藏或顯示的指示器。

trans-unit.source: To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, you can also provide a ToolTip that shows the encryption level when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator.
trans-unit.target: 若要模擬 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示的行為，您也可以提供滑鼠指標停留在指標上停留時顯示的加密層級的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevelChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevelChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevelChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.EncryptionLevelChanged>事件。

For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.FileDownload> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.FileDownload>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.FileDownload> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.FileDownload>事件。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control or any of its child windows has input focus.
<see langword="true" /> if the control or any of its child windows has input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項或任何其子視窗具有輸入焦點，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Focused" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Focused" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Focused" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Focused" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: Navigates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control to the previous page in the navigation history, if one is available.
<see langword="true" /> if the navigation succeeds; <see langword="false" /> if a previous page in the navigation history is not available.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method to implement a **Back** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, which will allow your users to return to a previous page in the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>方法，以實作**回**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中，這可讓您返回上一頁巡覽記錄中的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a previous page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性來判斷是否可瀏覽歷程記錄，同時包含前一頁。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged> event to receive a notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**回**按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method to implement a **Back** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>方法，以實作**回**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `backButton`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`backButton`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Navigates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control to the next page in the navigation history, if one is available.
<see langword="true" /> if the navigation succeeds; <see langword="false" /> if a subsequent page in the navigation history is not available.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method to implement a **Forward** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, allowing your users to return to the next page in the navigation history after navigating backward.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>方法，以實作**向前**類似於 Internet Explorer 中，可讓使用者之後向後巡覽至巡覽記錄中下一頁傳回一個 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A> property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>屬性來判斷是否瀏覽歷程記錄可用，及包含在目前的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForwardChanged> event to receive a notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForwardChanged>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**向前**按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method to implement a **Forward** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>方法，以實作**向前**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonForward`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonForward`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Navigates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control to the home page of the current user.
You can use this method to implement a **Home** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來實作**首頁**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The user can specify a home page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以指定首頁中**網際網路選項**對話方塊中，可從控制台或**工具**Internet Explorer 中的功能表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoHome%2A> method to implement a **Home** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoHome%2A>方法，以實作**首頁**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonHome`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonHome`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Navigates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control to the default search page of the current user.
You can use this method to implement a search feature similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來實作類似 Internet Explorer 中的搜尋功能。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the version of Internet Explorer installed, the user can specify a default search page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 根據安裝 Internet Explorer 版本，使用者可以指定預設搜尋網頁中的**網際網路選項**對話方塊中，可從控制台或**工具**功能表Internet Explorer。

trans-unit.source: The default search page is stored in the registry under the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page` registry key.
trans-unit.target: 預設的 [搜尋] 頁面會儲存在登錄中`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page`登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: With later versions of Internet Explorer, this registry key must be modified in order to change the default search page used by this method.
trans-unit.target: 與更新版本的 Internet Explorer 中，此登錄機碼必須經過修改才能變更這個方法所使用的預設搜尋網頁。

trans-unit.source: To use a search page other than the default, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A> method or specify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用非預設的 [搜尋] 頁面，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>方法，或指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoSearch%2A> method to implement a **Search** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoSearch%2A>方法，以實作**搜尋**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonSearch`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonSearch`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control is currently loading a new document.
<see langword="true" /> if the control is busy loading a document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項目前正在載入文件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A> method to halt the current navigation before the new document is fully loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A>中止目前的瀏覽新的文件完全載入之前的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ReadyState%2A> property to determine the exact navigation state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ReadyState%2A>屬性來判斷確切的導覽狀態的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsBusy%2A> property value is false when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ReadyState%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Complete?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsBusy%2A>屬性值為 false 時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ReadyState%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Complete?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control is in offline mode.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control is in offline mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> 控制項處於離線模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In offline mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control is forced to load Web pages from the local cache rather than downloading them.
trans-unit.target: 在離線模式中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項強制載入網頁，從本機快取，而不會下載它們。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or a sets a value indicating whether the shortcut menu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control is enabled.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control shortcut menu is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> 控制項捷徑功能表，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control displays a shortcut menu when a user right-clicks it.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項會顯示捷徑功能表，當使用者將其上按一下滑鼠右鍵。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用控制項做為一般的瀏覽器時，此行為是很有用。

trans-unit.source: If you want to conceal the fact that you are using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A> property to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要隱藏的事實，您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項，例如若要建立緊密結合了網頁型控制項與 Windows Form 控制項，使用者介面設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A>屬性設定為 false。

trans-unit.source: You can disable other standard browser features by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled%2A> properties to false.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定停用其他標準瀏覽器功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled%2A>屬性為 false。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。
