trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads the document at the specified location into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
The URL of the document to load.
Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control, replacing the previous document.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: When you call this overload, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to the specified URI and adds it to the end of the history list.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫這個多載，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至指定的 URI，並將它加入歷程記錄清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>將控制權交還給巡覽記錄中的上一頁的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>之後若要返回稍後出現的頁面巡覽記錄中向後巡覽方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method to force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，以強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A> method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>方法來實作類似 Internet explorer 網址列。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A> method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>方法來實作類似 Internet explorer 網址列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A> method to implement an address bar for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>方法，以實作網址列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonGo`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。

trans-unit.source: When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to the URL specified.
trans-unit.target: 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
The <paramref name="url" /> parameter value does not represent an absolute URI.
For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Uri.IsAbsoluteUri" />.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the document to load.
<see langword="true" /> to load the document into a new browser window; <see langword="false" /> to load the document into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into a new browser window or into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `false`, the control navigates to the specified URI normally and adds the URI to the end of the history list.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫具有這個多載`newWindow`參數值的`false`，控制項通常會巡覽至指定的 URI，並將 URI 新增至歷程記錄清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control loads the document at the specified URI into a new Internet Explorer window, which maintains its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫具有這個多載`newWindow`參數值的`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項將位於指定 URI 的文件載入到新的 Internet Explorer 視窗，以維護自己的瀏覽歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow> event to receive notification before a new browser window is opened, allowing you to cancel the action if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow>事件，以接收通知之前開啟新的瀏覽器視窗時，可讓您取消動作，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page or loads a page into a separate browser window, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至頁面或頁面載入不同的瀏覽器視窗時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method to force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，以強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a page is loaded into a separate Internet Explorer window, the user can retrieve the latest version by clicking the **Refresh** button.
trans-unit.target: 當網頁載入不同的 Internet Explorer 視窗時，使用者就可以擷取最新版本，即可**重新整理** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the document to load.
The name of the frame in which to load the document.

Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control, replacing the contents of the Web page frame with the specified name.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: When you call this overload, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫這個多載，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項指定之 uri 的文件載入網頁框架具有指定名稱，並將 URI 新增至歷程記錄清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的框架名稱無效，文件會載入到新的 Internet Explorer 視窗。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>將控制權交還給巡覽記錄中的上一頁的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>之後若要返回稍後出現的頁面巡覽記錄中向後巡覽方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method to force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，以強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>將控制權交還給巡覽記錄中的上一頁的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>之後若要返回稍後出現的頁面巡覽記錄中向後巡覽方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method to force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，以強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
The <paramref name="url" /> parameter value does not represent an absolute URI.
For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Uri.IsAbsoluteUri" />.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control has navigated to a new document and has begun loading it.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至新的文件已設定其中一個的下列屬性或方法呼叫時：

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated> event to receive notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has navigated to a new document.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項已巡覽至新的文件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated> event occurs, the new document has begun loading, which means you can access the loaded content through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>事件發生時，新的文件已開始載入，這表示您可以存取透過載入的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event to receive notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control finishes loading the new document.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項完成載入新文件。

trans-unit.source: You can also receive notification before navigation begins by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating> event.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以瀏覽開始處理之前收到通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>事件。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, the user has not completely filled out a form.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件可讓您取消巡覽，如果不符合特定條件，例如，使用者有不完整填寫表單。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated> event to implement an address bar for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>事件以實作網址列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonGo`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。

trans-unit.source: When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to the URL specified.
trans-unit.target: 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control navigates to a new document.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至新的文件已設定其中一個的下列屬性或方法呼叫時：

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating> event to cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>取消瀏覽，如果特定條件未符合，比方說，當使用者已無法完整填寫表單的事件。

trans-unit.source: To cancel navigation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs> object passed to the event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消瀏覽，設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this object to retrieve the URL of the new document through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs.Url%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個物件擷取的 URL，透過新的文件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs.Url%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the new document will be displayed in a Web page frame, you can retrieve the name of the frame through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs.TargetFrameName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的文件將會顯示在網頁上的畫面，您可以擷取透過框架名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs.TargetFrameName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated> event to receive notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>完成瀏覽控制項，且已開始載入新的位置處的文件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event to receive notification when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control finishes loading the new document.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>接收通知的事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項完成載入新文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating> event to cancel navigation when a Web page form has not been filled in.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>事件，以取消瀏覽網頁表單未被填入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property is used to determine whether the form input field contains a value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性用來判斷表單輸入的欄位是否包含值。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and that your form class has a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute> making it accessible to COM.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和您的表單類別具有<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>讓存取至 com。

trans-unit.source: For a complete code example that you can paste the following code into, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，您可以將下列程式碼貼到，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a new browser window is opened.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control opens a separate browser window when the appropriate overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A> method is called or when the user clicks the **Open in New Window** option of the browser shortcut menu when the mouse pointer hovers over a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項開啟另一個瀏覽器視窗時的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>方法呼叫，或當使用者按一下**在新視窗開啟**瀏覽器快顯功能表的選項時，滑鼠指標將滑鼠停留超連結。

trans-unit.source: You can disable the shortcut menu by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A> property to false.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定停用快顯功能表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A>屬性設定為 false。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow> event occurs before the new browser window is opened.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow>事件發生於開啟新的瀏覽器視窗之前。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event, for example, to prevent the window from opening when certain conditions have not been met.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理此事件，例如，若要防止視窗開啟時不符合特定條件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.NewWindow>事件。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that can be accessed by scripting code that is contained within a Web page displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
The object being made available to the scripting code.
trans-unit.target: 可讓指令碼使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to enable communication between a Web page hosted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control and the application that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來啟用所裝載的網頁之間的通訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項和應用程式，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you integrate dynamic HTML (DHTML) code with your client application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您整合動態 HTML (DHTML) 程式碼和用戶端應用程式程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The object specified for this property is available to Web page script as the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個屬性是做為網頁指令碼中使用的物件`window.external`物件，這是供主機存取的內建 DOM 物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定任何 COM 可見物件想公用屬性和方法的指令碼使用這個的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讓 COM 可見的類別標示為與<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: To call functions defined in your Web page from your client application code, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.InvokeScript%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> object you can retrieve from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫您的用戶端應用程式程式碼從您網頁中定義的函式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.InvokeScript%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>物件，您可以從擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A> property is set to the current form.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>屬性設定為目前的表單。

Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.CanGoBackChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.OnCanGoBackChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.OnCanGoBackChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusTextChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.OnStatusTextChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.OnStatusTextChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: Prints the document currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control using the current print and page settings.
You can use this method to implement a **Print** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來實作**列印**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This method prints the current document without requiring further user input.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列印目前文件，而不需進一步使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: To display the **Print** dialog box prior to printing, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示**列印**列印，使用之前的對話方塊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To display the **Page Setup** dialog box, which lets your users specify header and footer values and other page settings, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPageSetupDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示**版面**對話方塊中，可以讓使用者指定使用的頁首和頁尾值和其他的頁面設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPageSetupDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To display the **Print Preview** dialog box, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintPreviewDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示**預覽列印**對話方塊中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintPreviewDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Print%2A> method to implement a **Print** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control that is similar to the **Print** button in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Print%2A>方法，以實作**列印**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似的控制項**列印**Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonPrint`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonPrint`。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control has updated information on the download progress of a document it is navigating to.
You can use a handler for this event to implement a navigation progress bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件處理常式來實作類似 Internet Explorer 中瀏覽進度列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷已成功下載的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷可供下載的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the current state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ReadyState%2A> property to retrieve the specific state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control when you need more information than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsBusy%2A> property provides.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ReadyState%2A>屬性，以擷取特定狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制當您需要更多資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsBusy%2A>屬性提供。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control does not contain a document, the value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Uninitialized?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項並未包含文件，這個屬性的值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Uninitialized?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Other values indicate the control state when it navigates to a new document.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至新的文件時，其他值會表示控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: These values include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Loading?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Loaded?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Interactive?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Complete?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這些值包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Loading?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Loaded?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Interactive?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserReadyState.Complete?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the document currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
Reloads the document currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control by checking the server for an updated version.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method forces the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to implement a **Refresh** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來實作**重新整理**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> events do not occur when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 文件重新整理只會重新載入目前的頁面上，所以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件呼叫時不會發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method to implement a **Refresh** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，以實作**重新整理**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonRefresh`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonRefresh`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption" /> values.
Reloads the document currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control using the specified refresh options.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores recently visited Web pages in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽的網頁。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method forces the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The type of reload depends on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption> value specified.
trans-unit.target: 重新載入的類型取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption>指定值。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption.Completely?displayProperty=nameWithType> value, the latest version of the document is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption.Completely?displayProperty=nameWithType>下載文件的最新版本的值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption.IfExpired?displayProperty=nameWithType> value, the latest version is downloaded only if the current document has expired.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption.IfExpired?displayProperty=nameWithType>下載最新版本的值，只有當目前的文件已過期。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType> value, the server sends a copy of the document stored in its own cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserRefreshOption.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>值，伺服器會傳送一份文件儲存在它自己的快取。

trans-unit.source: A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> events do not occur when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 文件重新整理只會重新載入目前的頁面上，所以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigating>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件呼叫時不會發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> displays dialog boxes such as script error messages.
<see langword="true" /> if the control does not display its dialog boxes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項不顯示其對話方塊，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `false` to debug Web pages that you display in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`false`偵錯您在中顯示的網頁<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you use the control to add Web-based controls and scripting code to your application.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用控制項將網頁控制項和指令碼的程式碼加入至您的應用程式時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: It is less useful when you use the control as a generic browser.
trans-unit.target: 它不是很有用做為一般的瀏覽器使用的控制項時。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished debugging your application, set this property to `true` to suppress script errors.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成偵錯您的應用程式，這個屬性設定為`true`隱藏指令碼錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control hides all its dialog boxes that originate from the underlying ActiveX control, not just script errors.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed%2A>設`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制隱藏所有其對話方塊是來自基礎 ActiveX 控制項，不只是指令碼錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally you might need to suppress script errors while displaying dialog boxes such as those used for browser security settings and user login.
trans-unit.target: 有時候您可能需要隱藏指令碼錯誤時顯示對話方塊，例如所使用的瀏覽器安全性設定和使用者登入。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed%2A> to `false` and suppress script errors in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed%2A>至`false`和隱藏指令碼錯誤處理常式中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to suppress script errors without suppressing other dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何隱藏指令碼錯誤，而不隱藏其他對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed%2A> property is set to `false` to ensure that dialog boxes are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed%2A>屬性設定為`false`以確保會顯示對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType> event suppresses the error.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件會抑制的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This event is only accessible when a document is finished loading, so the handler is attached in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當完成文件時，才可存取此事件載入，所以此處理常式附加在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.

A reference to an implementation of the [IWebBrowser2 interface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=151479) could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX [WebBrowser control](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=151478).
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether scroll bars are displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if scroll bars are displayed in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在控制項中顯示捲軸，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is true.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 true。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `true`, scroll bars are displayed only when the page content is larger than the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值為`true`，頁面內容大於瀏覽器視窗時，才會顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: Opens the Internet Explorer **Page Setup** dialog box.
You can use this method to implement a **Page Setup** menu item similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來實作**版面**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表項目**檔案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the **Page Setup** dialog box, which lets your users specify header and footer values and other page settings prior to printing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會顯示**版面**對話方塊，可讓您指定頁首和頁尾值和其他之前列印的頁面設定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: To print the current document, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Print%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要列印目前文件，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Print%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To display the **Print Preview** dialog box, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintPreviewDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示**預覽列印**對話方塊中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPrintPreviewDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPageSetupDialog%2A> method to implement a **Page Setup** menu option that is similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowPageSetupDialog%2A>方法，以實作**版面**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表選項**檔案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a menu with a menu item called `MenuItemFilePageSetup` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含功能表與功能表項目稱為`MenuItemFilePageSetup`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Opens the Internet Explorer **Save Web Page** dialog box or the **Save** dialog box of the hosted document if it is not an HTML page.
You can use this method to implement a **Save As** menu item similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來實作**存**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表項目**檔案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box that appears when this method is called depends on the document type currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，會出現對話方塊取決於目前載入的文件類型。

trans-unit.source: This method allows users to save only the contents of the document as it was originally loaded.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓使用者儲存文件的內容，因為原本載入。

trans-unit.source: Any modifications made to the document at run time through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A> property are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 在文件進行任何修改執行階段<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Document%2A>屬性不會保存。

trans-unit.source: For information on retrieving the run-time modifications, see [How to: Access the HTML Source in the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-the-html-source-in-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需擷取執行階段修改的資訊，請參閱[如何： 存取 Managed HTML 文件物件模型中的 HTML 來源](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-the-html-source-in-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
The status text.
trans-unit.target: 狀態文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display the status of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性顯示的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>狀態列中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The status text is a message that contains information such as the URL of a hyperlink when the mouse pointer hovers over it and the URL of the document currently being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 狀態文字變成包含資訊，例如 URL 的超連結，將滑鼠指標停留在它與目前載入文件的 URL 時的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusTextChanged> event to update the status bar when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusTextChanged>事件狀態更新列時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText%2A> property to implement a status bar for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText%2A>屬性來實作狀態列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control called `StatusBar1`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText" /> property value changes.
Handle this event to update a status bar when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，以更新狀態列時的控制代碼的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.StatusText%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any pending navigation and stops any dynamic page elements, such as background sounds and animations.
You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A> method to implement a **Stop** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A>方法，以實作**停止**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A> method to implement a **Stop** button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Stop%2A>方法，以實作**停止**按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonStop`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonStop`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md).

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the current document.
A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> representing the URL of the current document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，代表目前文件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A> method and passing it the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>方法，並將其傳遞指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to the specified URL and adds it to the end of the history list.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至指定的 URL，並將它加入歷程記錄清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。

trans-unit.source: Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。

trans-unit.source: When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A> method to force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>方法，以強制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the URL of the current document, even if another document has been requested.
trans-unit.target: 即使已要求另一個文件，這個屬性會包含目前的文件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has not had time to load the new document.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定這個屬性的值，然後立即擷取一次擷取的值可能會與設定如果的值不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項在何時未於載入新文件的時間。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the new value in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取中的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A> property to implement an address bar for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.Url%2A>屬性來實作網址列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control called `webBrowser1`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control called `ButtonGo`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您的表單包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。

trans-unit.source: When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control navigates to the URL specified.
trans-unit.target: 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to an implementation of the <see langword="IWebBrowser2" /> interface could not be retrieved from the underlying ActiveX <see langword="WebBrowser" /> control.
The specified value when setting this property is not an absolute URI.
For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Uri.IsAbsoluteUri" />.
for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of Internet Explorer installed.
A <see cref="T:System.Version" /> object representing the version of Internet Explorer installed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Version" /> 物件，代表已安裝的 Internet Explorer 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control is a managed wrapper around a component installed with Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項是使用 Internet Explorer 一起安裝的元件的 managed 包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine which version of Internet Explorer is installed.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷已安裝的 Internet Explorer 版本。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when your application uses a feature of Internet Explorer that is present only in certain versions.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式使用存在於只在特定版本的 Internet Explorer 的一項功能時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: If the required version is not present on the local machine, you can provide alternative functionality or prompt the user to upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在於本機電腦上所需的版本，您可以提供的替代功能，或提示使用者進行升級。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this control.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用此控制項的立即呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether keyboard shortcuts are enabled within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if keyboard shortcuts are enabled within the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個控制項內已啟用鍵盤快速鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to false to prevent your users from using Internet Explorer keyboard shortcuts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設為 false，則防止您的使用者使用 Internet Explorer 鍵盤快速鍵與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines DHTML-based controls with Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要隱藏的事實，您會使用這非常有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項，例如若要建立緊密結合 dhtml 控制項與 Windows Form 控制項的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: You can disable other standard browser features by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定停用其他標準瀏覽器功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.AllowWebBrowserDrop%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.IsWebBrowserContextMenuEnabled%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled%2A>屬性。

Processes Windows messages.
